downb(bombpull).notes: Fuse timer of ~4 seconds. Bomb explosion hits on frame 1/3/5/7.  After pulling, lasts 196 frames and explodes on frame 197.

jab.notes: Transitions to rapid jab as early as frame 9.

upair.notes: Autocancels on frame 1-3 and 54 onward. Late hit added in 7.0.0 that does 12.0%.

sideb(din'sfire).notes: On release, startup is 14 and total frames is 39

upb(farore'swind).notes: Total frames is when landing on the ground. Intangible on frame 17-34. The move will normally be -29 as actually ending in the air is quite difficult/situational.

downb(phantomslash).notes: Startup values correspond to different stages of construction. Manual release total frames is 39. Takes 66 frames to reach final form. Startup for each stage of construction in order is 11, 8, 8, 8, 7. Fully constructed phantom activates automatically on frame 120. Advantage is for manual release".

pummel.notes: Total frames includes 13 frames of hitlag

jab1.notes: Transitions to Jab 2 as early as frame 6

jab2.notes: Transitions to Jab 3 as early as frame 6

downair.notes: Landing hit on frame 1. Autocancels on frame 1-3 and 50 onward

neutralb(paralyzer).notes: On release, startup is 1 and total frames is 28.

downb(flipjump).notes: Automatic bounce off target has 58 endlag but can end early if you land during it. Invulnerable on frame 3-12. Can transition to Manual kick as early as frame 14.

flipjump,kick.notes: Landing lag only occurs if you land during 59 frame animation or during the bounce after a hit, which is a 49 frame animation

grab.notes: Hand grab box only active for first 3 frames.

dashgrab.notes: Hand grab box only active for first 3 frames.

pivotgrab.notes: Hand grab box only active for first 3 frames.

pummel.notes: Total frames includes 13 frames of hitlag
